sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"影响"之意。
means: affect ：作主语通常是物而不是人，指一物对另一物产生的消极影响。
influence ：侧重在思想、性格、行为等方面所产生的潜移默化的影响，也可指自然力的影响。
impress ：强调影响既深刻又持久。

sentence.Network_en: I fell under the influence of a history master.
sentence.Network_cn: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

sentence.Network_en: The Shropshire landscape was an influence on Owen too.
sentence.Network_cn: 什罗普郡的风景也对欧文产生了影响。

sentence.Network_en: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position.
sentence.Network_cn: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from medieval Latin influentia 'inflow', from Latin influere, from in- 'into' + fluere 'to flow'. The word originally had the general sense 'an influx, flowing matter', also specifically (in astrology) 'the flowing in of ethereal fluid (affecting human destiny'). The sense 'imperceptible or indirect action exerted to cause changes' was established in Scholastic Latin by the 13th cent., but not recorded in English until the late 16th cent

encyclopedia.content: 发音 ['influəns]释义及例句名词 n. 1、影响； 感化力 Her influence made me a better person 她对我的影响使我成为一个更好的人。 The influence of climate on crops are self-evident. 气候对农作物的影响是不证自明的。 2、势力， 权势 He is a man of great influence in this town. 他在这个镇上是很有权势的人。 3、产生影响的人[事物] His parents no longer have any real influence over him. 他的父母对他已

entry.tran: 势力;权势;影响力;支配力
entry.def: Influence is the power to make other people agree with your opinions or do what you want.

example.ex: As Hugh grew older, she had less influence and couldn't control him...
example.tran: 休慢慢长大,她的影响力变小了,无法再控制他了。

example.ex: I have rather a large influence over a good many people...
example.tran: 我对很多人都有相当大的影响力。

entry.def: If you influence someone, you use your power to make them agree with you or do what you want.

example.ex: He is trying to improperly influence a witness...
The angry crowds could influence the government...
example.tran: 愤怒的群众可以影响政府。

entry.def: To have an influence on people or situations means to affect what they do or what happens.

example.ex: Van Gogh had a major influence on the development of modern painting...
example.tran: 凡·高对现代绘画的发展有着重大影响。

example.ex: The Shropshire landscape was an influence on Owen too...
example.tran: 什罗普郡的风景也对欧文产生了影响。

entry.def: If someone or something influences a person or situation, they have an effect on that person's behaviour or that situation.

example.ex: We became the best of friends and he influenced me deeply...
example.tran: 我们成了最好的朋友,他深深地影响了我。

example.ex: What you eat may influence your risk of getting cancer...
example.tran: 你吃的东西会影响你患癌症的风险。

entry.def: Someone or something that is a good or bad influence on people has a good or bad effect on them.

example.ex: I thought Sue would be a good influence on you...
example.tran: 我认为苏能对你产生良好影响。

example.ex: TV is a bad influence on people.
example.tran: 电视会对人们产生不良影响。

entry.tran: 在…影响之下;在…控制之下
entry.def: If you are under the influence of someone or something, you are being affected or controlled by them.

example.ex: I fell under the influence of a history master...
example.tran: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

example.ex: The very earliest sculptures were made under the influence of Greek art...
example.tran: 最早的雕塑作品受到了希腊艺术的影响。

entry.tran: 喝醉;(吸食毒品后)处于迷幻状态
entry.def: If someone is under the influence, their mind is affected by alcohol or drugs.

example.ex: Police charged the man with driving under the influence...
example.tran: 警方指控那名男子酒后驾车。

example.ex: We find members of the opposite sex more attractive when under the influence.
example.tran: 我们喝醉时感到异性更具吸引力。

means.word_mean: 1. a power to affect persons or events especially power based on prestige etc;

sentences.sentence: "used her parents' influence to get the job"

means.word_mean: 2. causing something without any direct or apparent effort
3. a cognitive factor that tends to have an effect on what you do;

sentences.sentence: "her wishes had a great influence on his thinking"

means.word_mean: 4. the effect of one thing (or person) on another;
5. one having power to influence another;

sentences.sentence: "she was the most important influence in my life"
"he was a bad influence on the children"

means.word_mean: 1. have and exert influence or effect;

sentences.sentence: "The artist's work influenced the young painter"
"She worked on her friends to support the political candidate"

means.word_mean: 2. shape or influence; give direction to;
3. induce into action by using one's charm;

sentences.sentence: "She charmed him into giving her all his money"

auth_sentence.content: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.
auth_sentence.res_content: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This ability to influence temperature would have been invaluable.

auth_sentence.res_content: Would the UK's influence in the world change?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Would the UK's influence in the world change?

auth_sentence.content: Not forgetting Greek, though the influence is subtle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not forgetting Greek, though the influence is subtle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not forgetting Greek, though the influence is subtle.

Sentence.sentence: Food labels may influence our body's response to food
B ) Psychological factors influence our hunger levels.
Swedish family-friendly policies tend to exert a negative influence on women's careers.
Women's working time is influenced by the number and age of their children, but men's working time is not affected by these factors.

The Home Depot approach to craftsmanship - simplify it, dumb it down, hire a contractor - is one signal that mastering tools and working with one's hands is receding in America as a hobby, as a valued skill, as a cultural influence that shaped thinking and behavior in vast sections of the country.

sentences.en: Her influence made me a better person.
sentences.cn: 她对我的影响使我成为一个更好的人。

sentences.en: He is a man of great influence in this town.
sentences.cn: 他在这个镇上是很有权势的人。

sentences.en: His parents no longer have any real influence over him.
sentences.cn: 他的父母对他已不再有任何约束力了。

sentences.en: The labour enthusiasm of the workers strongly influenced us.
sentences.cn: 工人们的劳动热情强烈地感染了我们。

sentences.en: It's all too easy to be influenced by our parents.
sentences.cn: 我们容易受父母的影响。

sentences.en: The labour enthusiasm of the workers strongly influenced us.
sentences.cn: 工人们的劳动热情极大地感染了我们。

jushi.english: Heredity and environment are influences on character.
jushi.chinese: 遗传和环境都是影响性格的因素。

jushi.english: He is a man of great influence in this town.
jushi.chinese: 他在这个镇上是很有权势的人。

jushi.english: Her influence made me a better person.
jushi.chinese: 她对我的影响使我成为一个更好的人。
